articles.description: Razorpay will use the funding to take its digital payments offering to South East Asia, make acquisitions and build out its neo-banking platform.

articles.title: Myanmar junta chief to attend ASEAN summit in first foreign trip since coup - The Star Online
articles.description: (Reuters) -Myanmar junta chief Min Aung Hlaing will attend an Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) summit in Indonesia on April 24, Thailand said on Saturday, for his first known foreign trip since he seized power on Feb. 1.
